title: 'Vicious' killer's execution, blocked under Biden, is moving ahead
shortDescription: Oklahoma had scheduled John Hanson's execution for Dec. 15, 2002, but the Biden administration blocked his transfer from federal custody to the state.

title: Trump administration proposes to slash power plant pollution limits
shortDescription: Critics say they are concerned that EPAâ€™s actions do not consider the impacts of pollution on public health

title: Fulbright board resigns, citing interference by Trump administration
shortDescription: All members of the board that oversees the U.S. State Department's Fulbright Program have voted to resign.

title: Musk called Trump before his public apology
shortDescription: Elon Musk reached out and talked privately to President Donald Trump before the billionaire entrepreneur apologized for his harsh personal attacks.

title: As the dust settles on Musk and Trump's fight, what about the GOP bill
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Elon Musk appear to be making up after a very public fight following Musk's opposition to Trump's bill. Does he support it?

title: Trump is OK with peaceful protests during DC parade, White House says
shortDescription: The White House said President Trump supports peaceful protests after Trump warned of "heavy force" for "any protesters" who disrupt his parade.

title: Do I need tickets for Trump's military parade? What to know
shortDescription: Tickets for Trump's military parade on June 14 are limited but prospective attendees might still be able to procure them. Here's how.

title: Trump, China agree on trade deal framework
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Chinese officials agree on a framework for a trade deal to include tariffs and eased rare earth restrictions.

title: Musk backs down: World's richest man caves to Trump White House
shortDescription: Elon Musk has taken steps to restore his relationship with President Trump and surrender, saying he regrets some of his comments during their feud.

title: Le Prez and 'Les Mis': Trump, Melania to see hit musical at Kennedy Center
shortDescription: Trump's visit to the Kennedy Center with his wife, the vice president and the second lady is his first time attending a show at the iconic arts venue.

title: Trump newborn accounts, the latest bill (of many) bearing his name
shortDescription: Republicans renamed the 'MAGA accounts' to the "Trump accounts." Many congressmembers have introduced legilslation honoring Trump. Here are a few.

title: Four former Biden aides to testify in GOP probe on his mental acuity
shortDescription: The House Oversight Committee's investigation alleges Biden was not mentally capable of leading the country during his presidency.

title: Musk regrets some posts about President Trump
shortDescription: Elon Musk says some of his posts about President Trump "went too far" during a public war of words.
